Grand River Hospital to Waterloo Regional Health Network (WHRN) - WHRN at Queen’s Boulevard

197-bed adult acute-care hospital * specializing in core areas of clinical focus:<ul><li>regional cardiac care centre</li><li>emergency care<br></li><li>integrated comprehensive care</li><li>service and supports</li><li>respiratory and thoracic care</li><li>surgical services</li><li>medicine</li><li>nuclear medicine</li></ul> <br><b>Emergency Department Wait Times:</b> <a href="https://www.smgh.ca/patients-visitors/emergency-department-wait-times" target="_blank">www.smgh.ca/patients-visitors/emergency-department-wait-times</a><BR><BR><B>Services and Programs:</B><UL><LI>Diagnostic Imaging</LI><LI>Laboratory</LI><LI>Regional Cardiac Care Centre</LI><LI>Spiritual Care</LI><LI>Waterloo Region Sexual Assault/Domestic Violence Treatment Centre</LI></UL>
